description: Activity result callback not triggered after startActivityForResult. Modern Activity Result API issues.
commonCauses: Result callback lambda captured in wrong scope
Process death between launch and result
Multiple launchers with conflicting request codes
solutions: Register launcher in onCreate or as class field
Use registerForActivityResult instead of deprecated API
Ensure target activity calls setResult before finish
Use correct ActivityResultContract for your use case
Test result delivery with different scenarios
prevention: Always register launchers early (onCreate or field initialization)
Test result delivery including process death
Ensure target activities call setResult properly
